channel.title: Pain Relief – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Shin Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Sleeve with 3 mm gel polymer soft cushion pads moulded at the shin, protecting it from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable

The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Back Brace Body Jacket
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Intended for folks with arthritis or instability of the lumbar spine. The additional support offers relief to lower back pain while limiting flexion, stretching, and bending. Assists in recovery with spondylolysis, herniated or bulging disc, lumbar fracture management, post-operative stabilization, and spinal stenosis.

The post Back Brace Body Jacket appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Full support for thoracic to lumbar region
  • Main Velcro® closure with three additional belts for optimal adjustment
  • Special poly insert for firm support
  • Keystone pad gives extra lumbar support

Waist Size
28″ – 32″ Small
32″ – 36″ Medium
36″ – 40″ Large
40″ – 44″ Extra Large
44″ – 48″ 2XL

The post Back Brace Body Jacket appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Neoprene Wrist Support
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This wrist support brace is made of Neoprene, a flexible material that provides protection to injured wrists.

The post Neoprene Wrist Support appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Aids in the healing of injured wrists
  • Made with powerful elastic for adjustable support
  • Easily adjusted for maximum convenience

Wrist Circumference Brace Size
4.5″ – 5.5″ Extra Small
5.5″ – 6.5″ Small
6.5″ – 7.5″ Medium
7.5″ – 8.5″ Large
8.5″ – 9.5″ Extra Large

item.description:
• Adjustable velcro® closures assures garment stays put
  • 2 inch elastic elbow brace
  • One size fits most

item.title: Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pure Gel Self Adhesive Metatarsal Protector Pads for Flip Flop Sandals are specially designed for open toe footwear and thong sandals in particular. Measuring 3.75" long & 2.5" wide at the ball of the foot and 2mm thick, the soft polymer gel cushion protects the ball of the foot region by absorbing shock and evenly distributing weight. A built in low profile toe spreader helps to part the toes gently and further reduce rubbing and irritation. A hypoallergenic self adhesive backing fastenes the pad securely in place.

  • Cushions and absorbs shock at the ball of the foot or metatarsal regiion to redistribute pressure and reduce friction for relief from soreness and a burning sensation in the feet
  • Built in toe spreader provides protection from irritation caused in between the toes by wrapping around and guarding the toe thongs on flip flop sandals
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastens the pad in place during use
  • Latex free medical grade gel polymer

The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips prevent and comfort blisters and callusing caused by friction, and improve the comfort of poorly fitting footwear. A hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps it securely in place.

  • 1 Size Fits All - Measures 4" x 1" (at center) to 1.88" (wider at ends)
  • Offers targeted spot protection for relief from sensitive blisters, corns and hot spots on the heel of the foot
  • Cushions and absorbs shock to protect back of the heel from painful friction
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastens the pad in place
  • Latex free medical grade gel polymer

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
How to use:

  1. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before use. Do not use on open wounds!
  2. Remove the protective plastic sheet from the Heel Grip and place it in the shoe at the heel
  3. Press hard to secure the grip
  4. Adjust positioning to find best placement for you

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• 1 Size Fits Most
  • Sleeve stretches to accommodate several sizes
  • Low profile, ergonomic design takes up minimal space in shoes for max comfort
  • Latex Free, Durable, Washable & Reusable

The post Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This sleeve fits securely over the big toe, helping to keep it securely in place. An open toe design keeps the rest of your toes free from constraint. Soft Deramed gel lining contains mineral oil to moisturize and hydrate the skin, helping to break down calluses while elasticized fabric compression sleeve lined with gel to protect and comfort painful areas prone to bunions and irritation.

The post Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Wear AT Surgical Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves while sleeping or resting or in closed shoes to soften dry, cracked, rough heels. The inside of the heel area of these heel socks is lined with a moisturizing silicone gel that helps to repair damaged skin. Keeps your heels soft & smooth by eliminating cracks and hard, rough skin - helping to soothe, moisturize and heal tough calluses.

  • The fabric of the heel sleeves is vented at the top and leave an open toe so you can feel comfortable, cool and dry while you sleep
  • May use with moisturizing lotions, creams or other topical treatments for even faster results
  • Washable and reusable.

The post Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads are soft to the touch with a hypoallergenic self adhesive backing to ensure they are fastened securely in the proper position. Ideal for pain under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before trying.

  • Ideal for relieving the burning sensation under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. The product provides excellent pressure relief and redistributes the impact on the heel
  • Low profile ergonomic design makes these a good option for use in any footwear, including open toe sandals, court shoes, boots, high heels or women's shoes with a narrow fit.
  • Reduce discomfort from sore, tired feet, heel pain, heel spurs, blisters, warts, etc.
  • One size fits all. Heel pads measure 3" x 2". Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps pads in place.
  • Sold in pairs. Washable and reusable. Allow to dry naturally.

The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
